summary: Six college students discover their dorm was once an insane asylum that conducted gruesome lobotomies on its teenage inmates during the 1930's.
cast: Sarah Roemer|Jake Muxworthy|Mark Rolston|Travis Van Winkle|Ellen Hollman|Carolina Garcia|Cody Kasch|Lin Shaye|Joe Inscoe|Gabe Wood|Randall Sims|Andrea Powell|Pete Burris|Caroline Kent|Brantley Pollock|Crystal Coney|Ben Daniele|Cody Hanford|Bridget Gethins|Ron Clinton Smith|Juan-Carlos Guzman|Jamie Moore|Charles Cabaniss|Emily Alsdorf|Aaron Blomberg|Jerry Cashman|Jamie Hill Fuller|Montrey Gordy
title: Asylum
